title: Collaborative Information Literacy Project-Based Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational scientific knowledge and general information retrieval skills
context.additional_context: Information literacy enhancement program for in-service secondary science teachers: cultivating practical lesson design skills via collaborative inquiry and production activities using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can critically evaluate and select information sources within authentic science classroom contexts
Learners can collaborate with peers to create information maps on scientific topics using digital tools
Learners can develop and share creative science education content (videos, infographics, etc.) based on information analysis results
Learners can evaluate their information utilization process and propose improvement plans through reflective journaling
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
